dialog.tekoha.auth.title: Authentication Form
dialog.tekoha.auth.signup: Your account doesn't have a registered password. Create a new password to continue. If left blank, no password will be required, but your account will be vulnerable.
dialog.tekoha.auth.login: Type in your password to continue.
dialog.tekoha.auth.fail: Wrong password. If you need help, talk to an administrator.
